manufacturer: TONG LUNG METAL INDUSTRY CO., Ltd.
label: PL2S0S10-ZW

metadata.inclusion:
Tap add device on your app, then back to lock.
Enter programming code -> confirm -> Enter 9 -> confirm
If you hear 2 long beeps from your lock the programming was successful.
If you hear short 3 beeps from your lock you must start over again
metadata.exclusion:
Tap add device on your app, then back to lock.
Enter programming code -> confirm -> Enter 9 -> confirm
If you hear 2 long beeps from your lock the programming was successful.
If you hear short 3 beeps from your lock you must start over again
metadata.reset: Press the R button for more than 5 seconds; the programming is reset back to the original factory codes once you hear 3 long beeps
